DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect blueberry powder insulin sensitivity obese , non-diabetic , insulin resistant subject . The investigator hypothesize supplementation blueberry powder result increase insulin sensitivity obese subject insulin resistance .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Blueberries Enhancing Insulin Sensitivity Humans : A Pilot Study
DOC.detailed_description: Insulin resistance key pathophysiologic feature `` metabolic syndrome '' strongly associate co-existing cardiovascular risk factor accelerate atherosclerosis . Due clinical consequence associate insulin resistance subject metabolic syndrome type 2 diabetes , clinical regimen direct increase insulin sensitivity vivo remain one desirable goal treatment . Although well establish lifestyle modification improve insulin resistance effectively improve many risk factor associate metabolic syndrome , success maintain lifestyle change human chronic period poor . Therefore , strategy improve insulin resistance pharmacological mean represent traditional approach clinical medicine . However , widespread use dietary supplement general public , nutritional supplementation use botanical extract effectively increase insulin sensitivity represent attractive novel approach . Unfortunately , considerable controversy exist regard effect botanical supplement metabolic syndrome large part efficacy data many supplement use purpose consists uncontrolled study anecdotal report . As , paucity data human regard effect botanical improve measure insulin action vivo cellular aspect insulin action . However , several line evidence vitro vivo model suggest botanical may modulate intracellular pathway glucose metabolism . Specifically , preclinical data use extract grapes blueberry suggest component botanical mixture , e.g . anthocyanins resveratrol , may play role enhance cellular pathway insulin action . On clinical level , cellular pathway insulin action enhance , e.g . PI-3 kinase activity , associate increase whole body glucose disposal reflect measure assess insulin sensitivity . However , limited experience human study insulin sensitivity assess use `` gold standard '' technique assess vivo insulin action . Therefore , project 's overall objective examine role specific botanical ( i.e. , blueberry powder ) insulin action vivo use hyperinsulinemic-euglycemic clamp . This pilot trial design evaluate fix consumption blueberry powder provide data effect large , comprehensive study plan . To accomplish goal , conduct randomize , placebo-controlled pilot clinical study blueberry powder design assess insulin sensitivity subject obese insulin resistant . We hypothesize blueberry powder effective , compare placebo , increase insulin action vivo . If , pilot trial provide necessary background progress study subject Type 2 diabetes . An increase insulin sensitivity patient Type 2 diabetes expect markedly reduce glucose level .
DOC.criteria: Subjects ≥ 20 year age . Subjects currently treat diabetes medication . Subjects fast blood glucose time screen ≤ 110 mg/dL . Subjects Body Mass Index ( BMI ) ≥ 32 ≤ 45 . Written Informed Consent obtain PRIOR perform screen test study procedure . Subjects glucose disposal rate ≤ 650 mg/min assess clinically visit 4 Subjects prior history Type 2 diabetes . Women pregnant lactating . Women childbearing potential use effective method birth control , condom spermicidal gel foam , contraceptive patch , surgically sterilize , least 2 year postmenopausal . Subjects type 1 diabetes . Subjects currently thiazolidinediones ( rosiglitazone pioglitazone ) take agent previous 12 week . Subjects concomitant therapy glucocorticoid ( except topical inhalant glucocorticoid ) . Other medication effect glucose homeostasis ( i.e . ACE inhibitor ) acceptable administer stable dosage precede 6 month dosage continue unchanged study . Subjects history evidence significant gastrointestinal dysfunction . Subjects chronic use laxatives cathartic . The use stool softener acceptable . Use bulk agent , require , remain constant . Subjects take concomitant therapy medication know nephrotoxic , aminoglycosides , methicillin , cyclosporin . Subjects evidence clinically significant renal dysfunction disease , e.g . serum creatinine > 1.5 mg/dL male > 1.4 mg/dL female and/or BUN > 50 mg/dL , proteinuria > 1 gram/day 4+ proteinuria dipstick urinalysis . Subjects clinically significant cardiovascular dysfunction and/or history ( within precede 6 month ) significant cardiovascular dysfunction , e.g. , congestive heart failure serious arrhythmia , myocardial infarction , cardiac surgery ; transient ischemic attack cerebrovascular accident precede six month ; diagnosis symptomatic autonomic neuropathy history orthostatic hypertension , syncope , hypertension systolic blood pressure ≥180 mm Hg diastolic blood pressure ≥110 mm Hg time screen visit . Subjects evidence within precede 6 month hepatic disease dysfunction , e.g . AST , ALT , alkaline phosphatase total bilirubin twice upper limit normal ; hepatitis ; jaundice ; cirrhosis . Subjects clinically significant pulmonary , neurologic , hematologic , immunologic , neoplastic metabolic disease . Subjects evidence recurrence malignancy within past five year , excise basal cell carcinoma . Subjects surgery anticipated study period . Subjects history substance abuse alcoholism within past 5 year , significant psychiatric disorder would interfere subject 's ability complete study . Subjects donate blood month prior study entry plan study . Subjects participate study use investigational drug precede 3 month . Subjects current smoker smoke within previous 6 month . No smoking allow study . Subjects allergic blueberry . Subjects lactose intolerant . Subjects consume drink daily serving berry ( i.e. , blueberry , strawberry , bilberry , cranberry , elderberry , raspberry ) , grape , fruit juice contain berry grape , wine 3 time per week . Subjects fluctuation body weight > 5 % precede 2 month . Subjects take prescription counter medication supplement desire weight loss .
